original_text: “There is no one like you, Lord, and there is no God but you, as we have heard with our own ears.
korean_text: 여호와여 우리 귀로 들은 대로는 주와 같은 이가 없고 주 외에는 하나님이 없나이다

sentences.original_text: There is no one like you, Lord,
and there is no God but you,
as we have heard with our own ears.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 귀로 직접 들은 바와 같습니다.
